text: The Bomb Factory Art Foundation is an artist-led foundation with exhibition space for contemporary art, based in Archway, Islington, London, England. The Bomb Factory organises exhibitions and events, including open studio events. Exhibited artists include Rachel Ara, Alfie Kunga, Paul Stafford, Mark Wallinger (2007 Turner Prize winner), and Jwan Yosef (founder member). ==References== ==External links== * The Bomb Factory Art Foundation website * * Category:2015 establishments in England Category:Arts organizations established in 2015 Category:Art galleries established in 2015 Category:Arts organisations based in England Category:Non-profit organisations based in London Category:English artist groups and collectives Category:Organisations based in the London Borough of Islington Category:Contemporary art galleries in London
title: The Bomb Factory Art Foundation
